mcq.statement: Pick up the correct statement about photochemical smog: Photo chemical smog is caused by NO2, Photochemical smog occurs in day time whereas the classical smog occurs in early morning hours, Photo chemical smog contains nitric oxide and unburnt hydrocarbon as main reactants, Both A and B

options.a: Photo chemical smog is caused by NO2
options.b: Photochemical smog occurs in day time whereas the classical smog occurs in early morning hours
options.c: Photo chemical smog contains nitric oxide and unburnt hydrocarbon as main reactants
